title: What are the best commercial jingles of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the UK, I would say that this,  the Heinz Baked Beans advert series would qualify. It was so good that ten years after they stopped using that tune, seven and eight year old kids knew it perfectly. As an aside, a few education “experts” ripped into Heinz for their clever misspelling, claiming it was liable to lower educational standards.
Coca-Cola’s 1971 “Hilltop” ad:  Probably the best of all time.
